channel.description: Recent content in prose on Azul Note

item.title: Agree to Disagree
item.description: 平和的に争いを終わらせるたった一つの方法 AIと何度も議論を重ねてきて、気づいたことが在る。「agree to disagree」という言葉の魔力で

Christmas is coming but I have nothing to do. I don’t have any plans or events to attend and I’m feeling a bit down about it. I know the holiday is about spending time with loved ones, but with the pandemic still raging on, it’s hard to feel the holiday cheer this year. I’m trying to stay positive and focus on the things I’m grateful for, but it’s tough. On a brighter note, I switched my hosting service from Vercel to github.
